name: Legends of Salamanca
description:
Very early prototype in active development

Turned based strategy game based on the mechanics of Shining Force.

Plan to introduce a story and turn it into more of an rpg

May also make a 2 player online mode where people can battle against each other.

Will publish updates in the dev log!

Credits

  • I am using some assets created by https://pipoya.itch.io/ that I'm using for my prototype so thanks very much pipoya. 
  • a background asset from https://ansimuz.itch.io/cyberpunk-street-environment/download/eyJleHBpcmVzIjoxNj...
  • I am missing some credits at the moment (particularly for the explosion animation but will put them up soon)
